data.quote: The ebulliently sharp mind of 'White Christmas' director Walter Bobbie made me tremble and strive in the same breath. The deceptively 'simple' dialogue of David Ives, asking every actor to just. say. it. Float it on the breeze; it doesn't need 'explanation,' just energy and truth.

data.quote: For a Jewish guy, I've recorded a lot of Christmas albums.

data.quote: I just travel all the time. And I was just looking at the schedules now and starting the first week of October I will be every weekend with somebody at tournaments through Christmas. So it gets very difficult to just go away and not do that.

data.quote: If you want to build a ship, don't drum up people to collect wood and don't assign them tasks and work, but rather teach them to long for the endless immensity of the sea.
data.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

data.quote: Hard work opens doors and shows the world that you are serious about being one of those rare - and special - human beings who use the fullness of their talents to do their very best.
data.author: Robin S. Sharma

data.quote: Creativity is a habit, and the best creativity is the result of good work habits.
data.author: Twyla Tharp

data.quote: Never continue in a job you don't enjoy. If you're happy in what you're doing, you'll like yourself, you'll have inner peace. And if you have that, along with physical health, you will have had more success than you could possibly have imagined.
data.author: Johnny Carson

data.quote: There was a time when men thought it was sexy to have a housewife waiting for him to come home from work in her slippers, but in modern society, I think an independent woman is even more sexy.
data.author: Kat Graham

data.quote: I'm lucky to be part of a team who help to make me look good, and they deserve as much of the credit for my success as I do for the hard work we have all put in on the training ground.
data.author: Lionel Messi

data.quote: Change can be frightening, and the temptation is often to resist it. But change almost always provides opportunities - to learn new things, to rethink tired processes, and to improve the way we work.
data.author: Klaus Schwab

data.quote: Be patient, work hard and consistently, have faith in your writing, and don't be afraid to listen to constructive criticism.
data.author: Jonathan Galassi

data.quote: The glory is being happy. The glory is not winning here or winning there. The glory is enjoying practicing, enjoy every day, enjoying to work hard, trying to be a better player than before.
data.author: Rafael Nadal

data.quote: Our greatness has always come from people who expect nothing and take nothing for granted - folks who work hard for what they have, then reach back and help others after them.
data.author: Michelle Obama

data.quote: To realize the American dream, the most important thing to understand is that it belongs to everybody. It's a human dream. If you understand this and work very hard, it is possible.
data.author: Cristina Saralegui

data.quote: Passion is needed for any great work, and for the revolution, passion and audacity are required in big doses.
data.author: Che Guevara

data.quote: Enjoy your sweat because hard work doesn't guarantee success, but without it you don't have a chance.
data.author: Alex Rodriguez

data.quote: I never expect to see a perfect work from an imperfect man.
data.author: Alexander Hamilton

data.quote: Let the future tell the truth, and evaluate each one according to his work and accomplishments. The present is theirs; the future, for which I have really worked, is mine.
data.author: Nikola Tesla

data.quote: There is never just one thing that leads to success for anyone. I feel it always a combination of passion, dedication, hard work, and being in the right place at the right time.
data.author: Lauren Conrad

data.quote: I think our family motto is to always work hard, be humble, kind, and thoughtful about others around us.
data.author: Anwar Hadid

data.quote: Fixing a broken immigration system. Protecting our kids from gun violence. Equal pay for equal work, paid leave, raising the minimum wage. All these things still matter to hardworking families; they are still the right thing to do; and I will not let up until they get done.
data.author: Barack Obama

data.quote: The medical literature tells us that the most effective ways to reduce the risk of heart disease, cancer, stroke, diabetes, Alzheimer's, and many more problems are through healthy diet and exercise. Our bodies have evolved to move, yet we now use the energy in oil instead of muscles to do our work.
data.author: David Suzuki

data.quote: Working hard and working smart sometimes can be two different things.
data.author: Byron Dorgan

data.quote: I'm not a 'sexy' 'beautiful' woman. It takes a lot of work to make me look like a girl.
data.author: Megan Fox

data.quote: To be happy, it first takes being comfortable being in your own shoes. The rest can work up from there.
data.author: Sophia Bush

data.quote: Work hard. Through determination and self-focus and discipline, you can accomplish anything.
data.author: Kimberly Guilfoyle

data.quote: It's good to test yourself and develop your talents and ambitions as fully as you can and achieve greater success; but I think success is the feeling you get from a job well done, and the key thing is to do the work.
data.author: Peter Thiel

data.quote: Young people are threatened... by the evil use of advertising techniques that stimulate the natural inclination to avoid hard work by promising the immediate satisfaction of every desire.
data.author: Pope John Paul II

data.quote: I believe in stopping work and eating lunch.
data.author: L'Wren Scott

data.quote: Don't work for recognition, but do work worthy of recognition.
data.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

data.quote: I'm so not stylish by nature, but I've learned to work with what I have.
data.author: Julie Bowen

data.quote: Let us touch the dying, the poor, the lonely and the unwanted according to the graces we have received and let us not be ashamed or slow to do the humble work.
data.author: Mother Teresa

data.quote: If you want to make peace with your enemy, you have to work with your enemy. Then he becomes your partner.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
data.author: Plato

data.quote: It takes a lot of energy to be negative. You have to work at it. But smiling is painless. I'd rather spend my energy smiling.
data.author: Eric Davis

data.quote: I have no idols. I admire work, dedication and competence.
data.author: Ayrton Senna

data.quote: Don't worry about being a star, worry about doing good work, and all that will come to you.
data.author: Ice Cube

data.quote: Doing stunt work is risky, but it's something I enjoy.
data.author: Verne Troyer

data.quote: I've always believed that if you put in the work, the results will come.
data.author: Michael Jordan

data.quote: My success was due to good luck, hard work, and support and advice from friends and mentors. But most importantly, it depended on me to keep trying after I had failed.
data.author: Mark Warner

data.quote: Good management consists in showing average people how to do the work of superior people.
data.author: John D. Rockefeller

data.quote: Whatever you want to do, do with full passion and work really hard towards it. Don't look anywhere else. There will be a few distractions, but if you can be true to yourself, you will be successful for sure.
data.author: Virat Kohli

data.quote: Journalism is what we need to make democracy work.
data.author: Walter Cronkite

data.quote: If you work for it, you'll deserve what comes. Hard work.
data.author: DeMar DeRozan

data.quote: Find a good teacher that will keep the game fun. Work hard and don't be afraid to have success or disappointment. That is what golf is all about.
data.author: Paula Creamer

data.quote: I work so hard to make that sure I'm successful. If you're positive and really excited and enthusiastic about what you're doing, it's going to happen, and it's going to happen big time.
data.author: Shawn Mendes

data.quote: Luck is a dividend of sweat. The more you sweat, the luckier you get.
data.author: Ray Kroc

data.quote: Work as though you would live forever, and live as though you would die today. Go another mile!
data.author: Og Mandino

data.quote: It was the labor movement that helped secure so much of what we take for granted today. The 40-hour work week, the minimum wage, family leave, health insurance, Social Security, Medicare, retirement plans. The cornerstones of the middle-class security all bear the union label.
data.author: Barack Obama

data.quote: Robots will harvest, cook, and serve our food. They will work in our factories, drive our cars, and walk our dogs. Like it or not, the age of work is coming to an end.
data.author: Gray Scott

data.quote: Before you start some work, always ask yourself three questions - Why am I doing it, What the results might be and Will I be successful. Only when you think deeply and find satisfactory answers to these questions, go ahead.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: Plan your work for today and every day, then work your plan.
data.author: Margaret Thatcher

data.quote: Developing a good work ethic is key. Apply yourself at whatever you do, whether you're a janitor or taking your first summer job, because that work ethic will be reflected in everything you do in life.
data.author: Tyler Perry

data.quote: There's only one growth strategy: work hard.
data.author: William Hague

data.quote: Motherhood is wonderful, but it's also hard work. It's the logistics more than anything. You discover you have reserves of energy you didn't know you had.
data.author: Deborah Mailman

data.quote: From my dad I learned to be good to people, to always be honest and straightforward. I learned hard work and perseverance.
data.author: Luke Bryan

data.quote: We are at our very best, and we are happiest, when we are fully engaged in work we enjoy on the journey toward the goal we've established for ourselves. It gives meaning to our time off and comfort to our sleep. It makes everything else in life so wonderful, so worthwhile.
data.author: Earl Nightingale

data.quote: Work hard. And have patience. Because no matter who you are, you're going to get hurt in your career and you have to be patient to get through the injuries.
data.author: Randy Johnson

data.quote: I don't believe in an outside agent that creates the world, then walks away. But I feel very strongly there is an intelligence at work in every flower, in every blade of grass, in every cell of my body. And it is that intelligence that, I wouldn't say created the universe. It is creating the universe. It's an ongoing process.
data.author: Eckhart Tolle

data.quote: All wealth is the product of labor.
data.author: John Locke

data.quote: Confidence comes from hours and days and weeks and years of constant work and dedication.
data.author: Roger Staubach

data.quote: Plans are only good intentions unless they immediately degenerate into hard work.
data.author: Peter Drucker

data.quote: We need to have complete certainty that things will work out, not because we are righteous or wise, but because of the time, the effort, the prayers, and the tools we are using. From the moment we are given awareness about some bigger picture or mission, we have to have complete focus on what to do to get to that place.
data.author: Yehuda Berg

data.quote: Stay open-minded; stay focused. Train hard and train smart. For me, the older I get, the smarter I have to train also, because the recovery time is longer. Work on everything: become a well-rounded fighter - don't just be good at one thing; be good at everything.
data.author: Brock Lesnar

data.quote: To make our way, we must have firm resolve, persistence, tenacity. We must gear ourselves to work hard all the way. We can never let up.
data.author: Ralph Bunche

data.quote: Good things happen to those who hustle.
data.author: Chuck Noll

data.quote: There is no better feeling than doing well while you are doing good. If you really want to meet the nicest, most caring people in your field, get involved with charity work. The thankless hours that go into planning charity dinners, running a carnival, and gathering donations for silent auctions are noticed and appreciated.
data.author: Jay Samit

data.quote: No man ever got very high by pulling other people down. The intelligent merchant does not knock his competitors. The sensible worker does not knock those who work with him. Don't knock your friends. Don't knock your enemies. Don't knock yourself.
data.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

data.quote: Making better choices takes work. There is a daily give and take, but it is worth the effort.
data.author: Tom Rath

data.quote: It is the quality of our work which will please God and not the quantity.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: Let there be work, bread, water and salt for all.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: In the city, we work until quitting time. On the farm, we work until the job is finished.
data.author: John Bytheway

data.quote: Bragging about yourself violates norms of modesty and politeness - and if you were really competent, your work would speak for itself.
data.author: Adam Grant

data.quote: One thing an exceptional employee never says is, 'That's not in my job description.' Exceptional employees work outside the boundaries of job descriptions.
data.author: Travis Bradberry

data.quote: Football taught me how hard you had to work to achieve something.
data.author: Kenny Chesney

data.quote: I never did a day's work in my life. It was all fun.
data.author: Thomas A. Edison

data.quote: Canada was built around a very simple premise. A promise that you can work hard and succeed and build a future for yourselves and your kids, and that future for your kids would be better than the one you had.
data.author: Justin Trudeau

data.quote: And where I excel is ridiculous, sickening, work ethic. You know, while the other guy's sleeping? I'm working.
data.author: Will Smith

data.quote: If God can work through me, he can work through anyone.
data.author: Francis of Assisi

data.quote: Our contribution purely depends on our consciousness and our willingness to support those in need, to show vulnerability and accept the support of others, to share without expecting the credit, to give it our all and allow our hard work to decide the outcome, to understand that control can only be achieved with a shared responsibility.
data.author: Yehuda Berg

data.quote: By working faithfully eight hours a day you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day.
data.author: Robert Frost

data.quote: My dad said to me, 'Work hard and be patient.' It was the best advice he ever gave me. You have to put the hours in.
data.author: Simon Cowell

data.quote: I give thanks everyday that I've been able to take my craziness and make it work for me.
data.author: Fritz Scholder

data.quote: Meditation can help us embrace our worries, our fear, our anger; and that is very healing. We let our own natural capacity of healing do the work.
data.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

data.quote: Surround yourself with people who take their work seriously, but not themselves, those who work hard and play hard.
data.author: Colin Powell

data.quote: The moment we believe that success is determined by an ingrained level of ability as opposed to resilience and hard work, we will be brittle in the face of adversity.
data.author: Joshua Waitzkin

data.quote: I feel like a tiger right now. There's nothing impossible if you get up and work for it.
data.author: Michael Flatley

data.quote: What I like to do is try to make a difference with the work I do.
data.author: David Bowie

data.quote: We truly believe with hard work, dedication and perseverance, we can become the best at what we do. No one wants to become mediocre.
data.author: Andy Biersack

data.quote: Your ego can become an obstacle to your work. If you start believing in your greatness, it is the death of your creativity.
data.author: Marina Abramovic
